chunks.chunk_text: Hello guys and welcome to another episode of 15 Minutes Cafe。每週三來到15 Minutes Cafe英語咖啡館,喝一杯老師們的本週主題特調,一起探討國際文化、時事質押網路和音樂等多元主題,輕鬆吸收主題相關的詞彙、慣用語和常用例句喔!And today we have Clem in the house, welcome!安安!Hello everyone!

chunks.chunk_text: 安安!Got it!
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: So Clem, what is your favourite traditional Taiwanese dessert?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: You guys know, shaved ice and shaved snow is big, it's part of our childhoods.And also now, thanks to some of the brands going over to the western world, now in LA, in London and in Australia, they have shaved ice and shaved snow as well.So apart from Boba, which is the new bubble tea, we used to call it bubble tea,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: and now it's Boba tea.And shaved ice is the big thing.For Clem, it's tofu pudding, and for me, it's shaved ice.But technically, Clem, we can also mix the two together, can't we?Absolutely!Absolutely!We can mix the two together.So, your favourite store in Taipei for tofu pudding?Do you really need to hear that?Sure!I told you I was from Chiayi.Yes.So you don't trust any Taipei tofu pudding stores?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: Yeah.Not at all.You are not helping us getting sponsors.Because Chiayi, we add tofu pudding with soybean milk.Really?Yeah.So soy on soy, right?Because tofu pudding is made from soybeans, and then soy milk is made from soybeans, so it's soy on soy.Yeah.Don't you think it's great?For Chiayi people, it's great.For me, it's like, okay, too much soy.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: But hear me out, Clem, you're not helping us getting sponsors in Taipei.If you keep saying Chiayi, we need Chiayi sponsors.I was hoping you say something like, oh, Dong Qu Fen Yuan, or any of the stores that's famous for tofu pudding in Taipei, and you say Chiayi.But let's put it this way.In Taipei, your tofu pudding is usually in, I think, brown sugar soup, right?Mostly.Mostly brown sugar soup.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: So for Chiayi people, the soy milk, is that also sweetened soy milk, or just plain soy milk?A little sweet.Really?So it's soy on soy.It's just a lot of soy in the mouth.You can put the ingredients.Oh, okay.Technically, what I grew up with, the shaved ice with all the toppings and all the fancy dessert ingredients on top, is what you guys put on top tofu pudding and together with soy milk.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: Oh, very cool.So we definitely have to talk about some of the topping and some of these ingredients.But the base, I think, me, shaved ice, you, tofu pudding base.Great.So let's get that out of the way.I mentioned earlier, Clem, that there's shaved ice and shaved snow.And do you know the difference?To be honest with you, I know the difference from the visual, from looking at it.Shaved ice is like frappuccino ice, like very
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: fine crushed ice to me.And sometimes that crushed ice may not be very crushed.Sometimes it could also be cut by a blade, right?It's like this round disk of ice that gets sort of shaved by a blade, but it gets crusty.It doesn't get very soft.But shaved snow is like, it's almost like cheese.You know, when they start slicing it off, it feels like cheese.So I'm assuming that they put a bit of milk in that ice.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: Oh, very correct.Really? Did I get it right?Yeah, you get it right.Oh, I'm so smart.Because if you shave the ice, technically ice itself, it depends on how you freeze your water, right?It's very inconsistent.So sometimes the pieces are like slices, some are chunks, some are blocks.So it's very irregular, very inconsistent.But once you add, let's say, milk or juice to the ice, you actually change the texture.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: So when you shave it, it gives off this very fine paper-like texture.So that's the way I understood it.I would assume, okay, shaved snow is just some additional ingredients or juice or milk in the ice.Actually, I think it is more ice bricks from milk.Ding dong, one point for me.And have you heard it is a kind of ice?It's named called bubble ice.Bubble ice.I have to tell you, when I heard
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: this name before, my mom was like, oh, I grew up with bubble ice.And I'm like, it's for oldies.So I stayed away from it.I didn't bother.I didn't bother with it.But please educate me.What exactly is bubble ice?Because my mom keeps talking about it.Oh, this is so nice.I went to your auntie's house in Taoyuan and we had some Taoyuan bubble ice.And I'm like, okay, good for you, old ladies.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: I don't know if she knows the names, but she just tells me, oh, bubble ice is so nice.And I don't get it.To me, it's sort of a very traditional type dessert.So tell me, is it shaved ice or what kind of ice is it?I think it tastes more like sorbet.Oh, it's more like sorbet.So can we call it Taiwan sorbet?My understanding of sorbet is it's got a very
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: soft texture.You don't taste the ice, really, right?It's almost like, and it's not very creamy.It's usually mostly made from fruits.Am I correct?Mostly made from fruits and smoothie.And smoothies.Okay.So it's got a very fine texture.And that is why people say 泡泡冰.Very fine bubbly texture.And I suppose it got its name long time ago because my mom talked about this soda flavor.Soda flavor.Soda flavor bubble ice.So I assume that that's what gives off
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: the 泡泡冰 idea, right?Like soda.You know, put everything what my mom tells me together.And this is what I'm trying to understand.So we got 泡泡冰 as well.Can we still get it today in Taipei?I don't think so.I think you got to go to Taoyuan, Tainan.You got to go to this countryside to get it.Yeah, you can find it, but yeah, not that common anymore.It's not that common.It's sad.We don't have it in the traditional markets either.It's not available in night markets.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: So we got shaved ice, shaved snow, bubble ice.Now for shaved ice and shaved snow, we have to put toppings on them.Bubble ice, do we put any toppings on them?Bubble ice.Not usually.Not usually, right?But that's why it's more like sorbet.Sorbet is not meant to be had with other toppings.You are supposed to have sorbet and bubble ice
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: on its own.You're not supposed to add toppings.But shaved ice and shaved snow, let's talk about the toppings.And for you, of course, it's tofu pudding.So let's talk about your favorite toppings.Generally, tofu pudding, how many toppings can you put in usually a dessert set meal in Jiayi?Four or five toppings?Because in Taipei, it's only three toppings, generally.Three to four.I think generally three, also three, yeah.Generally, it's three toppings.Give me your

chunks.chunk_text: top three toppings you must have on your tofu pudding.My three toppings, my favorite one.I think number one must be mung bean.Mung beans, the green bean.Yes.Yeah, mung beans, green beans, very healthy.Good for summer too.But it's a joke, you know.What do you mean it's a joke?Okay, got it.Fine.Sure.There is a shop in Taipei
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: It's not a joke.It's a real shop.Yeah.Mung bean and what else?Mung bean and I think peanuts are great.Okay, you would add peanuts.I think tofu pudding and peanuts always goes well together, right?If you don't know what to add, peanuts are always great.Good.So you got mung beans, peanuts and your third topping.Okay, I think barley is good.Oh, so your three favorite toppings are
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: number one mung beans, number two barley and number three peanuts.Interesting.And what's your favorite ingredients?I think peanuts, if I don't know, it really depends on what I like that day.But generally, peanuts must have and I must have pearl barley and not barley, the smaller one, the chewier one.And sometimes if you go to these shaved ice shops and they don't have barley,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: pearl barley, they sometimes have oats.So I can settle with oats.Oats, I'm okay.If they don't have barley, I'm fine.So barley is kind of chunky.I don't like it.I think pearl barley is chewy.It's nice.And it's kind of nice.You know, the texture goes well.And next, I must have tangyuan glutinous rice balls.Interesting.You see, I'm going for the texture there, right?So shaved ice, it's crunchy.I want something

chunks.chunk_text: like mochi, like soft, chewy glutinous rice ball.And then I want something that's sort of in between the pearl barley.So when I put it in my mouth, it's hard and soft and chewy at the same time.And of course, this all goes on.Sometimes I would ask the shop to add some either brown sugar soup or I don't know, I used to like condensed milk, not anymore.It's just too much right now for me.So I used to add condensed milk.Now it's more like, hey, just give me

chunks.chunk_text: a dab of the brown sugar soup.Good for me.But my tofu pudding combination always pearl barley and peanuts.Nothing else.I don't care.Sometimes they ask me, hey, do you need an extra topping?And I say, no, it's perfect this way.I don't need it.It's okay.I can afford it.You know, sometimes you go and it's 60 NT for three toppings.And I just tell them, it's okay.I just want two.But this is tofu pudding.So what's your favorite?

chunks.chunk_text: I like the ingredients with the shaved ice.Shaved ice I just mentioned.Tangyuan, right?Glutinous rice ball and pearl barley and also peanuts.So you don't like fruits?No, thank you.Don't need.Mango shaved ice.Very good.Now that's a different shaved ice in my view, because that's not about topping.If you buy mango shaved ice, then it's mango time.If you go strawberry shaved ice, it's strawberry time.Usually it comes in a set, correct?Most of the time it comes in a set.

chunks.chunk_text: So there's nothing to choose.You have to buy mango shaved ice.Done.No toppings.But the traditional shaved ice, you can choose your toppings.I don't know.The modern way, the traditional way, I'm not so sure.But most of the time, like my wife, every time she sees strawberry shaved ice, that's what she will have.She's a big strawberry fan.And then second in line would be mango shaved ice.And then we sell them.If we do have any type of shaved ice once a year, we would have the traditional ones.Now in Taipei, it's mostly the

chunks.chunk_text: bad.Grass jelly.Why grass jelly?Grass jelly and taro, the taste don't really mix, do they?One is very herbal, one is very earthy.What is earthy mean?Earthy like potatoes, you know, potatoes and peanuts are very earthy too, right?Tarros are very earthy.But grass jelly has got that herb flavor.Actually, I like the herb flavor.You do?I do.So Chinese herbal teas are fine with you too.I'm a herb

chunks.chunk_text: tofu pudding, is it?It's very different, because your tofu pudding, you would never have taro with your tofu pudding.Tofu pudding in Taipei with black sugar and black sugar soup, I will, but in Jiayi no.Why not?What's wrong with Jiayi taro?Oh, I thought you don't mind any mixture, but you do.Okay, good, good.At least you're normal like us, Clem, thank you.You're normal like us.We do care about some combinations of flavors, right?Some

chunks.chunk_text: flavors are really great and some flavors are very particular.Sometimes you enjoy a weird flavor.So here are some other toppings that are popular amongst, let's say, our family members and your family members too, Clem.For instance, my wife is also other than a big fan of anything taro or taro ball.She is also a big fan of jelly cake, this yellow irregular shaped thing.It's got a funny taste.

chunks.chunk_text: I don't get it, but she loves it.Funny taste.I can't explain that taste.It's yellow.A little chewy?It's not that chewy.It's sort of jelly-like, and then it's irregular.It's not cut in a proper shape.And I always wondered why.Anyways, so she loves it.She would have it in her desserts.And then we also got pudding.Uni-president pudding.Tong Yi Pudding sometimes.I see people do that.I don't get it either.If I want Tong Yi Pudding, if I want Uni-president pudding, then I just go buy pudding.

chunks.chunk_text: I don't add it to my desserts, but some people do.And obviously for my parents, it's all the fruits, right?Either dried fruits or mango, strawberry, or kiwi, if they got any type of fruits.They think it's healthy.They want to have shaved ice with some fruits.And it's a healthy day, but technically desserts are not.They're all very sugary.And my parents are big fans of condensed milk on any shaved ice.Condensed milk is very good.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: Condensed milk, that's their childhood taste.For me, it's not my childhood taste, because sometimes it's just a little overbearing in terms of the flavor.Condensed milk will take over your dessert.It's very milky, very sweet.And I don't enjoy that.So I'm a big advocate for brown sugar soup.For me, brown sugar, a little bit of brown sugar soup will take you a long way.That's me.So that's the traditional dessert that we hear and see in summer.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: And all the international visitors would want this.My friends from Singapore, my friends from Germany, they all want this.This is the Taiwan flavor in summer.But in recent years in Taiwan, we also have a lot of fancy Western dessert,Western ice creams per se, right?And Family Mart and 7-Eleven for one, these convenience stores for one, have been big promoters of a very interesting ice cream flavor.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: So what does New Balance taste like?

chunks.chunk_text: It looks like black sesame ice cream.And these ice creams are not your Haagen-Dazs ice creams.So what do we call them, Clem?Just to test you, just to quiz you a little bit.Okay, these kind of ice cream, I can tell you.It's name is Soft Serve.Soft Serve.So where do we see Soft Serve?Ice cream trucks, right?Ice cream trucks or 7-Eleven?7-Eleven in Taiwan.Family Mart?Yeah, Family Mart.If you want fancy Soft Serve in Taiwan, you go to the convenience stores.They've got fancy
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: stuff.And I remember a year or two ago, people would go and hunt down different convenience stores for Soft Serve because it's not widely available at all the stores.I don't know if you remember this, Clem.It was all over the news.People would go run to a different part of Taipei.They go to Shenzhong and they go to Danshui.They go wherever to go hunt down some special Soft Serves.And it was all over Instagram.But New Balance?I don't get it.You can choose.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.229_ 夏季甜食吃什麼綠豆加薏仁配豆花如何 Klim and her summer dessert - soy on soy.json

chunks.chunk_text: What does it taste like?Like New Balance.Stinky shoes.I'm gonna kill our sponsors again.We welcome New Balance to sponsor our show.Yes, we can do something about New Balance.Love your ice cream, by the way.So it's very, very cool because having Soft Serve in Taipei or at least in Taiwan right now through convenience stores, through their brand collaborations, it's very cool.

chunks.chunk_text: So Movenpick sorbet.But of course, we got to move on to another Western dessert, a Western ice cream that everybody thinks it's kind of cool and it's really expensive today.It's gelato.Very fancy.Fancy, cool, good as a gift and expensive.Gelato.Gelato.Gelato.And in gelato, Taiwan people call it Italian ice cream.So I had to correct my wife because she's like, oh, let's go have Italian ice cream.And I said, no, that's not called Italian ice cream.It's called gelato.
